author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In the kingdom of oil and dinar,
Where desert storms in fable are spun,
Brac'd by the Saudis, the wares grow thin'er,
A rise in fortune 'fore year is done.

Whilst in the land where spices bloom,
Lies tension 'neath G20's grand dome,
The world's great houses in subtle feud loom,
Where rivalry stark, makes India home.

In the realm where the olive trees grow,
Where ancient Romans held high their might,
A new seven-year bond they bravely sow,
At eve, they reveal in autumn's soft light.

feedItems.title: Oil Set for Weekly Rise on Saudi Supply Cuts
feedItems.description: Oil prices edged lower in Europe but were on course for a second weekly gain, with UBS saying that Saudi Arabia’s supply cut extension and falling inventories should push Brent price to $95 a barrel by the end of the year.

feedItems.title: India Hosts G-20 Summit in Shadow of Geopolitical Rivalries
feedItems.description: Deepening global rifts will be an undercurrent at this week’s gathering of the world’s largest economies.

feedItems.title: Italy Expected to Announce Launch of New Seven-Year BTP
feedItems.description: The Italian Treasury is expected to announce the launch of November 2030-dated BTP when it releases the details of the Sept. 13 bond auction on Friday evening, UniCredit Research said.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
For workers in Chevron's grand ale-vats contend,
Their labor, in faith, they'll not feebly expend.
Gorgon and Wheatstone bear 7% global weight,
The earth's thirst for natural gas will soon abate.

To the realm of Teutons, where gold flows in rivers mist,
Inflation has the burgher's wallet in a twist.
For prices have risen by 6.1 score,
Our good Brothers at ECB may ignore no more.

Once fair Venice, such comely sight,
Now is crushed by the tourist's might.
Yet fear not, pilgrims, for a fee is planned,
To tame the wild tourist band.

feedItems.title: Chevron Workers Begin Industrial Action at Australian LNG Plants
feedItems.description: The company’s Gorgon and Wheatstone facilities account for about 7% of global liquefied-natural-gas supply.

feedItems.title: German Inflation Confirms Initial Estimates
feedItems.description: German consumer prices were 6.1% higher in August, a rate the ECB could consider too high to ignore when deciding whether to raise rates next week.

feedItems.title: Overrun by Tourists, Venice Plans Entry Fee for Day Trippers
feedItems.description: The Italian city and other popular destinations are taking measures to cope with a crush of visitors.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
On Berkeley's path where profit's tide abounds,
Though bleak this year, their outlook tightly wound.
Yet lower lies the sum of sales profound,
In private lands, a loss of strength is found.

The noble euro rises, firm and true,
Whilst dollar weak, with sullen face is viewed.
For ECB's rate might foster new,
And Fed's own choice leaves market mood subdued.

BMW commend we do, with gold-tipped pen,
For their sagacious plan, we laud again.
In realms of engines both old and zen,
Balanced they stand, the sagest craftsman's den.

feedItems.title: Berkeley Backs Near-Term Outlook
feedItems.description: Berkeley said it remained on track to meet financial targets for the next two fiscal years, but the value of underlying private sales reservations were around 35% lower on-year in fiscal 2024.

feedItems.title: Euro Firms on Likely Divergence Between ECB, Fed Decisions in September
feedItems.description: The euro traded firmer against the dollar, following up on gains of the previous day, triggered by the possibility of an interest-rate increase by the ECB next week and unchanged policy rates by the Fed the week after, DZ Bank Research said.

feedItems.title: BMW Balancing Act With Electric and Traditional Engines Avoids Risk
feedItems.description: BMW’s approach to the battery-electric vehicle transition can be characterized as a balancing act that will put the car maker in a good position long-term, Bernstein said.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
The goat so wise gnaws on nature's meal,
Beware, mankind, the plastic yield.
One small tweak found in script's field,
Bequeaths earth's bounty, a healthier reveal.

Captive hare, hidden in its burrow, fears the storm,
Hong Kong market, silenced by weather's form.
Rest, oh traders, as the tempest takes its norm,
On Friday's morn, calm shall outperform.

Misguided dog chases its entangled tail,
Economy's data in familiar travail.
Yet we are lead, down uncertain trail,
Truth found only when revisions unveil.

feedItems.title: Delivery App Tweak Could Save 22 Billion Sets of Plastic Cutlery a Year, Study Shows
feedItems.description: A new study suggests delivery-app users can be gently persuaded to cut out three million metric tons of single-use cutlery a year.

feedItems.title: Hong Kong Stock Exchange Cancels Friday Trading Due to Bad Weather
feedItems.description: UPDATED: The Hong Kong Stock Exchange canceled all trading Friday after the city’s meteorological authority extended an extreme weather alert warning.

feedItems.title: Economic Data Lead Markets and Governments Astray
feedItems.description: Revisions to data are occasionally so big that they upend our shared understanding of what’s going on.
